alert.note: Alert for Clark; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:13PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Clark and Taylor Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 112 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Birchwood to Colfax. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Jump River around 200 PM CDT. Thorp around 210 PM CDT. Chelsea and Westboro around 235 PM CDT. Rib Lake around 240 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
